channel.title: Everything is coded right but it wont start! please help
channel.description: When i hit runserver it says Java is not regognized! I've tried everything!! Please help! :confused:

item.title: Everything is coded right but it wont start! please help
item.dc:creator: @kingofnone kingofnone
item.description:
@kingofnone wrote:

your path and class path are perfect. you can exit the enviornmental variables… now go to your compiler
right click edit
you will get something like this

@echo off if exist "C:\Program Files (x86)\" set programfiles=C:\Program Files (x86) set pro=%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.6.0_06 set pro2=%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.6.0_10 set jac=\bin\javac.exe set jav=\bin\java.exe :co1

the only part that really matters of that is the jdk part
so! what that means is were it says

jdk1.6.0_06

you put your jdk which you said you have jdk 6u13 so yours would be like this

@echo off if exist "C:\Program Files (x86)\" set programfiles=C:\Program Files (x86) set pro=%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.6.0_13 set pro2=%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.6.0_13 set jac=\bin\javac.exe set jav=\bin\java.exe :co1

notice the last two numbers in the jdk bit changed… that is how it recognizes your java

Read full topic
item.source: Everything is coded right but it wont start! please help

item.title: Everything is coded right but it wont start! please help
item.dc:creator: @kingofnone kingofnone
item.description:
@kingofnone wrote:

yeah now go into you’r compiler and make sure your jdk is jdk1.6.0_13 in all that it may have… example…

@echo off if exist "C:\Program Files (x86)\" set programfiles=C:\Program Files (x86) set pro=%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.6.0_06

make sure you’r

programfiles%\Java\jdk1.6.0_06

is the correct jdk that you have… i have 3,6,11,13 so i am set with putting random numbers in=]

item.description:

i have jdk 6 update 13 and this is my classpath C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_13\bin;%CLASSPATH%; and my path is C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_13\bin; is this right???
